00027 namespace chain
00028 {
00029   //------------------------------------------------ ScriptManager::ScriptManager
00030   ScriptManager::ScriptManager() : m_scriptCounter(0)
00031   {
00032     // initialise the lua script interpreter
00033     DOUT << "initialising lua\n";
00034     m_luaState = lua_open();
00035     luaL_openlibs(m_luaState);
00036 
00037     lua_register(m_luaState, "ch_print", _lua_print);
00038 
00039     // hard code replacement for lua's default io.write function
00040     if(luaL_dostring(m_luaState, "\
00041        io.write = ch_print \
00042        print = ch_print \
00043        print \"attempted to bind ch_print to io.write and print\""))
00044     {
00045       DOUT << "error setting ch_print";
00046     }
00047   }
00048 
00049   //------------------------------------------------ ScriptManager::~ScriptManager
00050   ScriptManager::~ScriptManager()
00051   {
00052     DOUT << "closing lua\n";
00053     lua_close(m_luaState);
00054   }
00055 
00056   //------------------------------------------------ ScriptManager::lua_print
00057   int ScriptManager::lua_print( lua_State *L )
00058   {
00059     // basic lua code interpreted from http://csl.sublevel3.org/lua/
00060     int argc = lua_gettop(L);
00061 
00062     std::cout << "$$ ";
00063 
00064     for(int i=1;i<=argc;++i){
00065       std::cout << lua_tostring(L, i);
00066     }
00067     std::cout << "\n";
00068     return 1;
00069   }
00070 
00071   //------------------------------------------------ ScriptManager::LuaErrorCheck
00072   int ScriptManager::LuaErrorCheck()
00073   {
00074     //std::string str;
00075     while (!lua_isnil(m_luaState, -1))
00076     {
00077       /* uses 'key' (at index -2) and 'value' (at index -1) */
00078       std::cout << "$$ " << lua_tostring(m_luaState, -1) << "\n";
00079       /* removes 'value'; keeps 'key' for next iteration */
00080       lua_pop(m_luaState, 1);
00081     }
00082 
00083     //lua_pop(m_luaState, 1); // remove error message
00084     return 0;
00085   }
00086 }
